body:
I think it would have been better to use the proper `add`/`sub` operations on `Dtype` instead of converting them to `Acctype` and then converting back. Even though this might not make a difference (because `Acctype` for float is float, and not double), I still think it would be cleaner.
Same thing for the following line.
